General.Name: Bachem Holding AG
General.Description: Bachem Holding AG, together with its subsidiaries, provides products for research, clinical development, and commercial application to pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies worldwide. The company engages in the development, production, and regulatory support of peptide active pharmaceutical ingredients, such as peptide and oligonucleotide new chemical entities (NCEs). It also offers commercial NCEs and generics; and project management, quality and regulatory, analytical, good manufacturing practice production, research grade production, and supply and vertical integration services. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Bubendorf, Switzerland.
